At Thu, 21 Aug 2008 18:25:37 -0700,
"Brendan O'Connor" <brenocon@...>=
 wrote:
> 
> Hi folks,
> 
> I'm trying to automate seed submissions to Heri=
trix via JMX and had a
> question.  If I start a job via the web interface,=
 that job is registered
> via JMX, appears inside jconsole, and I can call =
importUri() via the jmx
> commandline client to add a new seed.  But if I s=
tart a job via JMX, using
> the addJob() from CrawlService, then the create=
d job doesn't appear in
> jconsole.
>
> [=E2=80=A6]

Are you sure that the =
job has been created properly? I am able to
start jobs using addJob(), and =
the jobs are available in JMX & via
jconsole. I have had best results creat=
ing a jar that contains an
order.xml & a seeds.txt to use to start a job, b=
ut I can=E2=80=99t recall why
this worked better for me than the alternativ=
e.

best,
Erik Hetzner
